abstract.p: Aug 11 article about planned retirement of Pfizer chief exec William C Steere Jr misstated increases in company's sales and stock price during his leadership

block.p: An entry in the Business Digest yesterday about the planned retirement of William C. Steere Jr., chief executive of Pfizer, misstated the increases in the company's sales and stock price during his leadership. Sales have doubled since 1992, not nearly tripled; the shares have increased more than 400 percent in the last five years, not 500 percent.
